title: Honey Dijon salmon and asparagus
ingredients: ['1 1/2 teaspoons cornflour', '1 knob butter, melted', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1 dash white pepper', '2 (100g) fillets salmon', '1/4 cup chopped walnuts', '250g fresh asparagus, trimmed']
